title: Long-term trends impacting Chinese equities
body:
Deutsche Bank’s APAC Equity Strategist Will Stephens explains trends that investors should focus on, particularly in light of their impact on Chinese markets. In the latest Asia Takeaway video, he notes that the ongoing liberalisation of capital markets could result in the unleashing of over 76 trillion renminbi of household savings. At the same time, the opening of A-share markets could also boost the world’s second-largest equity market substantially.
View the full video.
